verses.verse: צַדִּ֤יק <WH6662> Righteous אַתָּה֙ <WH859> O יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> [art] thou O LORD כִּ֥י <WH3588> would אָרִ֖יב <WH7378> when I plead אֵלֶ֑יךָ <WH413> you אַ֤ךְ <WH389> Indeed מִשְׁפָּטִים֙ <WH4941> with thee of [thy] judgments אֲדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> with thee yet let me talk אוֹתָ֔ךְ <WH854> for מַדּ֗וּעַ <WH4069> Why דֶּ֤רֶךְ <WH1870> Wherefore doth the way רְשָׁעִים֙ <WH7563> of the wicked צָלֵ֔חָה <WH6743> prosper שָׁל֖וּ <WH7951> ? [wherefore] are all they happy כָּל־ <WH3605> in בֹּ֥גְדֵי <WH899> that deal very בָֽגֶד׃ <WH898> treacherously

נְטַעְתָּם֙ <WH5193> Thou hast planted גַּם־ <WH1571> have also שֹׁרָ֔שׁוּ <WH8327> them yea they have taken root יֵלְכ֖וּ <WH1980> grow גַּם־ <WH1571> have even עָ֣שׂוּ <WH6213> yea they bring forth פֶ֑רִי <WH6529> fruit קָר֤וֹב <WH7138> thou [art] near אַתָּה֙ <WH859> you בְּפִיהֶ֔ם <WH6310> in their mouth וְרָח֖וֹק <WH7350> and far from מִכִּלְיוֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH3629> their reins

וְאַתָּ֤ה <WH859> O יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> But thou O LORD יְדַעְתָּ֔נִי <WH3045> knowest תִּרְאֵ֕נִי <WH7200> me thou hast seen וּבָחַנְתָּ֥ <WH974> me and tried לִבִּ֖י <WH3820> mine heart אִתָּ֑ךְ <WH854> toward הַתִּקֵם֙ <WH5423> toward thee pull them out כְּצֹ֣אן <WH6629> like sheep לְטִבְחָ֔ה <WH2878> for the slaughter וְהַקְדִּשֵׁ֖ם <WH6942> and prepare לְי֥וֹם <WH3117> them for the day הֲרֵגָֽה׃ <WH2028> of slaughter ס

עַד־ <WH5704> against מָתַי֙ <WH4970> How תֶּאֱבַ֣ל <WH56> mourn הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> How long shall the land וְעֵ֥שֶׂב <WH6212> and the herbs כָּל־ <WH3605> of every הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <WH7704> of every field יִיבָ֑שׁ <WH3001> wither מֵרָעַ֣ת <WH7451> for the wickedness יֹֽשְׁבֵי־ <WH3427> of them that dwell בָ֗הּ סָפְתָ֤ה <WH5595> are consumed בְהֵמוֹת֙ <WH929> therein? the beasts וָע֔וֹף <WH5775> and the birds כִּ֣י <WH3588> Because אָמְר֔וּ <WH559> because they said לֹ֥א <WH3808> He will not יִרְאֶ֖ה <WH7200> He shall not see אֶת־ <WH853> אַחֲרִיתֵֽנוּ׃ <WH319> our last end

כִּ֣י <WH3588> If אֶת־ <WH854> with רַגְלִ֥ים ׀ <WH7273> with the footmen רַ֙צְתָּה֙ <WH7323> If thou hast run וַיַּלְא֔וּךָ <WH3811> and they have wearied וְאֵ֥יךְ <WH349> how תְּתַֽחֲרֶ֖ה <WH8474> thee then how canst thou contend אֶת־ <WH854> for הַסּוּסִ֑ים <WH5483> crane וּבְאֶ֤רֶץ <WH776> A land שָׁלוֹם֙ <WH7965> of peace אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you בוֹטֵ֔חַ <WH982> [wherein] thou trustedst וְאֵ֥יךְ <WH349> How תַּעֲשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> [they wearied thee] then how wilt thou do בִּגְא֥וֹן <WH1347> in the swelling הַיַּרְדֵּֽן׃ <WH3383> Jordan

כִּ֧י <WH3588> although גַם־ <WH1571> even אַחֶ֣יךָ <WH251> For even thy brethren וּבֵית־ <WH1004> and the house אָבִ֗יךָ <WH1> of thy father גַּם־ <WH1571> Even הֵ֙מָּה֙ <WH1992> they בָּ֣גְדוּ <WH898> even they have dealt treacherously בָ֔ךְ גַּם־ <WH1571> Even הֵ֛מָּה <WH1992> they קָרְא֥וּ <WH7121> with thee yea they have called אַחֲרֶ֖יךָ <WH310> after מָלֵ֑א <WH4392> a multitude אַל־ <WH408> not תַּאֲמֵ֣ן <WH539> thee believe בָּ֔ם כִּֽי־ <WH3588> although יְדַבְּר֥וּ <WH1696> them not though they speak אֵלֶ֖יךָ <WH413> about טוֹבֽוֹת׃ <WH2896> fair words ס

עָזַ֙בְתִּי֙ <WH5800> I have forsaken אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּיתִ֔י <WH1004> mine house נָטַ֖שְׁתִּי <WH5203> I have left אֶת־ <WH853> נַחֲלָתִ֑י <WH5159> mine heritage נָתַ֛תִּי <WH5414> I have given אֶת־ <WH853> יְדִד֥וּת <WH3033> the dearly beloved נַפְשִׁ֖י <WH5315> of my soul בְּכַ֥ף <WH3709> into the hand אֹיְבֶֽיהָ׃ <WH341> of her enemies

הָיְתָה־ <WH1961> has become לִּ֥י נַחֲלָתִ֖י <WH5159> Mine heritage כְּאַרְיֵ֣ה <WH738> is unto me as a lion בַיָּ֑עַר <WH3293> in the forest נָתְנָ֥ה <WH5414> add עָלַ֛י <WH5921> against בְּקוֹלָ֖הּ <WH6963> aloud עַל־ <WH5921> against כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> have come שְׂנֵאתִֽיהָ׃ <WH8130> against me therefore have I hated

הַעַ֨יִט <WH5861> bird צָב֤וּעַ <WH6641> [is] unto me [as] a speckled נַחֲלָתִי֙ <WH5159> Mine heritage לִ֔י הַעַ֖יִט <WH5861> the birds סָבִ֣יב <WH5439> round about עָלֶ֑יהָ <WH5921> against לְכ֗וּ <WH1980> along אִסְפ֛וּ <WH622> ye assemble כָּל־ <WH3605> all חַיַּ֥ת <WH2416> all the beasts הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <WH7704> of the field הֵתָ֥יוּ <WH857> come לְאָכְלָֽה׃ <WH402> to devour

רֹעִ֤ים <WH7462> pastors רַבִּים֙ <WH7227> Many שִֽׁחֲת֣וּ <WH7843> have destroyed כַרְמִ֔י <WH3754> my vineyard בֹּסְס֖וּ <WH947> under foot אֶת־ <WH853> חֶלְקָתִ֑י <WH2513> my portion נָֽתְנ֛וּ <WH5414> they have made אֶת־ <WH853> חֶלְקַ֥ת <WH2513> portion חֶמְדָּתִ֖י <WH2532> my pleasant לְמִדְבַּ֥ר <WH4057> wilderness שְׁמָמָֽה׃ <WH8077> a desolate

שָׂמָהּ֙ <WH7760> They have made לִשְׁמָמָ֔ה <WH8076> it desolate אָבְלָ֥ה <WH56> it mourneth עָלַ֖י <WH5921> before שְׁמֵמָ֑ה <WH8077> [and being] desolate נָשַׁ֙מָּה֙ <WH8074> is made desolate כָּל־ <WH3605> the whole הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> unto me the whole land כִּ֛י <WH3588> Because אֵ֥ין <WH369> no אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> because no man שָׂ֥ם <WH7760> layeth עַל־ <WH5921> before לֵֽב׃ <WH3820> [it] to heart עַֽל־ <WH5921> before כָּל־ <WH3605> the whole

שְׁפָיִ֣ם <WH8205> upon all high places בַּמִּדְבָּ֗ר <WH4057> through the wilderness בָּ֚אוּ <WH935> are come שֹֽׁדְדִ֔ים <WH7703> The spoilers כִּ֣י <WH3588> For חֶ֤רֶב <WH2719> for the sword לַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD אֹֽכְלָ֔ה <WH398> shall devour מִקְצֵה־ <WH7097> from the [one] end אֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> of the land וְעַד־ <WH5704> against קְצֵ֣ה <WH7097> even to the [other] end הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the land אֵ֥ין <WH369> There שָׁל֖וֹם <WH7965> shall have peace לְכָל־ <WH3605> all בָּשָֽׂר׃ <WH1320> no flesh ס

זָרְע֤וּ <WH2232> They have sown חִטִּים֙ <WH2406> wheat וְקֹצִ֣ים <WH6975> thorns קָצָ֔רוּ <WH7114> but shall reap נֶחְל֖וּ <WH2470> they have put themselves to pain לֹ֣א <WH3808> to no יוֹעִ֑לוּ <WH3276> [but] shall not profit וּבֹ֙שׁוּ֙ <WH954> and they shall be ashamed מִתְּבוּאֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <WH8393> of your revenues מֵחֲר֖וֹן <WH2740> because of the fierce אַף־ <WH639> anger יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD ס

כֹּ֣ה ׀ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> concerning כָּל־ <WH3605> all שְׁכֵנַי֙ <WH7934> neighbours הָֽרָעִ֔ים <WH7451> against all mine evil הַנֹּֽגְעִים֙ <WH5060> that touch בַּֽנַּחֲלָ֔ה <WH5159> the inheritance אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which הִנְחַ֥לְתִּי <WH5157> to inherit אֶת־ <WH853> עַמִּ֖י <WH5971> which I have caused my people אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Israel הִנְנִ֤י <WH2005> I am about נֹֽתְשָׁם֙ <WH5428> Behold I will pluck them out מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> concerning אַדְמָתָ֔ם <WH127> of their land וְאֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> the house יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> of Judah אֶתּ֥וֹשׁ <WH5428> and pluck out מִתּוֹכָֽם׃ <WH8432> from among

וְהָיָ֗ה <WH1961> will come אַֽחֲרֵי֙ <WH310> And it shall come to pass after נָתְשִׁ֣י <WH5428> that I have plucked them out אוֹתָ֔ם <WH853> אָשׁ֖וּב <WH7725> I will return וְרִֽחַמְתִּ֑ים <WH7355> and have compassion וַהֲשִׁבֹתִ֛ים <WH7725> on them and will bring them again אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> every man לְנַחֲלָת֖וֹ <WH5159> to his heritage וְאִ֥ישׁ <WH376> and every man לְאַרְצֽוֹ׃ <WH776> to his land

וְהָיָ֡ה <WH1961> Then אִם־ <WH518> if לָמֹ֣ד <WH3925> And it shall come to pass if they will diligently יִלְמְדוּ֩ <WH3925> learn אֶת־ <WH853> דַּֽרְכֵ֨י <WH1870> the ways עַמִּ֜י <WH5971> of my people לְהִשָּׁבֵ֤עַ <WH7650> to swear בִּשְׁמִי֙ <WH8034> by my name חַי־ <WH2416> liveth יְהוָ֔ה <WH3069> God כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> as they לִמְּדוּ֙ <WH3925> as they taught אֶת־ <WH853> עַמִּ֔י <WH5971> my people לְהִשָּׁבֵ֖עַ <WH7650> to swear בַּבָּ֑עַל <WH1168> by Baal וְנִבְנ֖וּ <WH1129> then shall they be built בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> in the midst עַמִּֽי׃ <WH5971> of my people

וְאִ֖ם <WH518> if לֹ֣א <WH3808> they will not יִשְׁמָ֑עוּ <WH8085> But if they will not obey וְנָ֨תַשְׁתִּ֜י <WH5428> I will utterly אֶת־ <WH853> הַגּ֥וֹי <WH1471> that nation הַה֛וּא <WH1931> he נָת֥וֹשׁ <WH5428> pluck up וְאַבֵּ֖ד <WH6> and destroy נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD ס
